SongStaked(address,uint256,address,addre.details: emitted when a ser stakes a song

params.artistRevenueAccount: the address of the account receiving the artists shares
params.collection: the address of the collection contract
params.staker: the address of the account staking the song

blacklistCollection(address).details: allows governance to blacklist a collection

params.collection_: the address of the collection to blacklist

constructor.details: the initializer modifier is to avoid someone initializing      the implementation contract after deployment

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

initialize(address,address,address).details: initializes the protocol and router addresses,      sets the UPGRADER_ROLE to governance (only governance can upgrade)      and also the WHITELISTER_ROLE to add and remove collections to the governance

params.beacon_: the beacon upgradeable contract of the songs
params.governance_: the address of the goverance contract (timelock actually)

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

params.artistRevenueAccount_: the address which should receive the artists funds
params.tokenId_: the id of the NFT in the collection

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

whitelistCollection(address).details: allows governance to whitelist a collection

params.collection_: the address of the collection to whitelist

_beacon.details: the address of the beacon contract for the song proxies upgrades

devdoc.title: the router to register songs (fabric) and manage collections

revenueOracle().notice: the address of the revenue oracle

stake(address,uint256,address).notice: stake an NFT from a whitelisted collection in the contract,         deploying the corresponding Song proxy contract

stakedSongs(address,uint256).notice: map to check if a holder has a token staked from an approved collection  COLLECTION_CONTRACT_ADDRESS => NFT_ID => HOLDER_ACCOUNT_ADDRESS OR ZERO_ADDRESS

stakedSongsCounter().notice: the counter of the songs staked

whitelistedCollections(address).notice: the curated list of whitelisted addresses
